title: Why doesn't the new Adobe Photoshop Camera app work on the Pixel 3a
content:
The app doesn't even show up  when I access the Playstore from the 3a.  When I go to the Playstore via my PC, it says the app is incompatible with my device.  Because of the app's good reviews, this is very disappointing.   Has anyone found a work-around ?

Thanks,
